projects.title: Employees Trip Management Mobile App
projects.description: Mobile application for a prominent oil and gas company to optimize employee routes and commutes between work camps.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive mobile solution that revolutionized employee transportation management for a major oil and gas company. The app enables employees to book trips and parking spaces for their daily commute, featuring real-time data updates on trip availability and parking options. This solution significantly improved operational efficiency and employee satisfaction.
achievements: Delivered app on time, exceeding client expectations
Received positive feedback for improved efficiency and decision-making
Contributed to scalable and modular architecture

projects.title: Health, Safety and Environment System
projects.description: Enterprise-grade backend system for HSE mobile app with comprehensive incident reporting and safety inspection features.
projects.longDescription: Led backend development for a critical HSE (Health, Safety, and Environment) system serving a major industrial client. Built robust RESTful APIs using Java Jersey framework, implementing complex business logic for incident reporting, safety inspections, and compliance management. The system handles thousands of daily transactions while maintaining high availability and security standards.
achievements: Successfully developed a robust backend system for the HSE mobile app
Ensured high-quality backend system through rigorous testing and debugging
Part of the maintenance team ensuring 99.9% uptime
